Class MainUI

    Author:
    thefurryman The base UI of the whole program, user interacts and activity is conducted from this class.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args -

      • selectGun

        public static void selectGun()
        Prompts the user using scanner and if/else to select a gun and will redirect to one of 3 gun methods depending on gun chosen

      • useHandgun

        public static void useHandgun()
        The handgun method where the rest of the activity is conducted. The handgun object is created and all attributes are initialized. 5 target objects are initialized. 5 while loops are used to correspond to 5 targets based on remaining ammo. Within the while loops the RNG method is called to determine whether or not the target is actually shot. Custom and full options to reload are available after all targets are destroyed. Afterwards, each target status is shown with boolean type.

      • useRifle

        public static void useRifle()
        The rifle method. Same as useHandgun() but with rifle attributes.

      • useShotgun

        public static void useShotgun()
        The shotgun method. Same as useHandgun() but with shotgun attributes

      • userOptions

        public static void userOptions()
        This method follows in sequence after the user selects their gun. This prompts the user of whether they would like to shoot targets or quit the program using Scanner objects and if/else statements
